<!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8" />
		<title></title>
		<style>
			canvas{border:1px solid red;}
			body{text-align:center}
		</style>
		<!---->
		<script src="requestNextAnimationFrame.js"></script>
		<!---->
		<script src="countFps.js"></script>
		<!---->
		<script src="windowTocanvas.js"></script>
		<!---->
		<script src="bgSprite.js"></script>
		<!---->
		<script src="Sprite.js"></script>
		<!---->
		<script src="Enemy.js"></script>
		<!---->
		<script src="plane.js"></script>
		<!---->
		<script src="Bullet.js"></script>
	</head>
	<body>
		<canvas id="canvas" width="320" height="568">
			~
		</canvas>
		<script>
			//
			var canvas=document.getElementById('canvas');
			var context=canvas.getContext('2d');
			
			
			// 
			var sprites=[];
					
			//
			var plane=createPlane();
			//
			sprites.push(plane);
					
			//  
			var smallEnemyTime=0;//
			var middleEnemyTime=0;//
			var bigEnemyTime=0;//
			var bulletTime=0;//
			
			//
			var score=0;
			
			
			// 
			//
			//
			var mousedown=false;
			canvas.onmousedown=function(e){
				mousedown=true;
			}
			
			//
			canvas.onmousemove=function(e){
				if(mousedown==true){
					//
					e=e||window.event;
					//canvas
					var ponit=windowToCanvas(this,e.clientX,e.clientY);
					//
					
					plane.left=ponit.x-plane.width/2;
					plane.top=ponit.y-plane.height/2;
				}
				
			}
			//
			canvas.onmouseup=function(e){
				mousedown=false;
			}
			
			
			
			
			function animate(time){
			
				//
				//
				if(time-smallEnemyTime>1500){
					//
					for(var i=0;i<3;i++){
						sprites.push(createEnemy('smallEnemy'));
					}
					//
					smallEnemyTime=time;	
	
				}
				
				//
				if(time-middleEnemyTime>3000){
					//
					sprites.push(createEnemy('middleEnemy'));
					sprites.push(createEnemy('middleEnemy'));
					//
					middleEnemyTime=time;
				}
				
				//
				if(time-bigEnemyTime>10000){
					//
					sprites.push(createEnemy('bigEnemy'));
					//
					bigEnemyTime=time;
				}
				
				//
				if(time-bulletTime>150){
					sprites.push(createBullet(plane.left+plane.width/2,plane.top-15));
					bulletTime=time;
				}
				
				
				
				
				//
				bgSprite.update(context,time);
				//
				bgSprite.paint(context);
				
				// 
				for(var i=0;i<sprites.length;i++){
					sprites[i].update(context,time);
					
					
					//
					if(sprites[i].visible==false){
						//
						if(sprites[i].name!='bullet' && sprites[i].name!='plane' ){//
							score=score+sprites[i].score;
						}
						
						//
						sprites.splice(i,1);
					}	
				}
				// 
				for(var i=0;i<sprites.length;i++){
					//
					if(sprites[i].name=='bullet'){
						for(var j=0;j<sprites.length;j++){
							//()
							if(sprites[j].name!='bullet' && sprites[j].name!='plane'){
								//
								//>
								if(sprites[i].left>sprites[j].left &&
									//<=+
									sprites[i].left<sprites[j].left+sprites[j].width &&
									//>
									sprites[i].top>sprites[j].top &&
									//<
									sprites[i].top<sprites[j].top+sprites[j].height){
								
									//>=1
									if(sprites[j].hp>=1){
										//-1
										sprites[j].hp-=1;
										//
										sprites[i].visible=false;
									}
									
								
								}
							
							}
						}
					}
					sprites[i].paint(context);
				}
				
				
				context.font='26px  ';
				//
				context.fillText(':'+sprites.length,150,540);
				//
				context.fillText(':'+score,170,30);
				
				//
				context.fillText('FPS'+countFps(),10,30);
				//
				window.requestNextAnimationFrame(animate);
			}
			
			window.requestNextAnimationFrame(animate);
			
			
		</script>
	</body>
</html>

Post.title: Git
Post._content:
# 

```python
#git  
git config --global user.name "Your Name Comes Here"  
  
#gitemail  
git config --global user.email you@yourdomain.example.com  
  
# 15  
git config --global credential.helper cache   
  
#  
git config --global credential.helper 'cache --timeout=3600'    
  
git config --global color.ui true  
git config --global alias.co checkout  
git config --global alias.ci commit  
git config --global alias.st status  
git config --global alias.br branch  
git config --global core.editor "mate -w"    # Editortextmate  
git config -1 #  
  
#git~/.gitconfig  
```

<!-- more -->

---

# 
```python
git help <command>  # commandhelp  
git show            #   
git show $id  
   
git co  -- <file>   #   
git co  .           #   
   
git add <file>      #   
git add .           #   
   
git rm <file>       #   
git rm <file> --cached  #   
   
git reset <file>    #   
git reset -- .      #   
git reset --hard    #   
   
git ci <file>  
git ci .  
git ci -a           # git add, git rmgit ci  
git ci -am "some comments"  
git ci --amend      #   
   
git revert <$id>    #   
git revert HEAD     #   
```


---

# diff

```python
git diff <file>     #   
git diff  
git diff <$id1> <$id2>   #   
git diff <branch1>..<branch2> #   
git diff --staged   #   
git diff --cached   #   
git diff --stat     #   

#diffQ.
```

---

# 

```python
git log  
git log <file>      #   
git log -p <file>   # diff  
git log -p -2       # diff  
git log --stat      #  
```

 tig
Mactigdifflogbrew install tig

---

# Git

```python
#  
git init  
  
#Clone  
git clone git@xbc.me:wordpress.git  
  
#origin git remote add [shortname] [url]  
git remote add origin git@xbc.me:wordpress.git  
  
#  
git remote -v  
```


---

# 

```python
#  
git add .  
  
#Deleted  
git add -u  
  
#  
git commit m ""  
  
#, git push [] []:[]  
git push origin master  
  
#  
git status  
  
#  
git add readme.txt  
  
#  
git rm readme.txt  
  
#  
git rm cached readme.txt  
  
#  
git mv reademe.txt readme  
  
#  
git log  
  
#amend  
git commit --amend  
  
#  
git commit m "add readme.txt"  
git add readme_forgotten  
git commit amend  
  
#git add .ab  
  
#ab  
git reset HEAD b  
  
#  
git checkout - readme.txt  
```


---

# 

```python
git br -r           #   
git br <new_branch> #   
git br -v           #   
git br --merged     #   
git br --no-merged  #   
   
git co <branch>     #   
git co -b <new_branch> #   
git co -b <new_branch> <branch>  # branchnew_branch  
   
git co $id          # checkout  
git co $id -b <new_branch>  # checkout  
   
git br -d <branch>  #   
git br -D <branch>  #  ()  
```


---

# rebase

```python
git merge <branch>               # branch  
git merge origin/master --no-ff  # Fast-Fowardmerge  
   
git rebase master <branch>       # master rebasebranch  
git co <branch> && git rebase master && git co master && git merge <branch>  
```


---

# Git()

```python
git diff > ../sync.patch         #   
git apply ../sync.patch          #   
git apply --check ../sync.patch  #  
```


---

# Git

```python
git stash                        #   
git stash list                   # stash  
git stash apply                  #   
git stash drop                   #   
```


---

# Git

```python
git pull                         #   
git pull --no-ff                 #   
git fetch origin                 #   
git merge origin/master          #   
git co --track origin/branch     #   
git co -b <local_branch> origin/<remote_branch>  #   
   
git push                         # push  
git push origin master           #
```

## 2.1 Lambda

LambdaJava 8  
JVMLambdaJavaLambda

LambdaLambdaLambda->

```java
Arrays.asList( "a", "b", "d" ).forEach( e -> System.out.println( e ) );
```

   

```java
Arrays.asList( "a", "b", "d" ).forEach( ( String e ) -> System.out.println( e ) );
```

LambdaJava  

```java
String separator = ",";
Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").forEach((String e) -> {
	System.out.print(e + separator2);
	System.out.print(e + separator2);
});
```

Lambdafinal   

```java
String separator = ",";
Arrays.asList( "a", "b", "d" ).forEach(
    ( String e ) -> System.out.print( e + separator ) );
```



```java
final String separator = ",";
Arrays.asList( "a", "b", "d" ).forEach(
    ( String e ) -> System.out.print( e + separator ) );
```

Lambdalambdareturn  

```java
Arrays.asList( "a", "b", "d" ).sort( ( e1, e2 ) -> e1.compareTo( e2 ) );
```


```java
Arrays.asList( "a", "b", "d" ).sort( ( e1, e2 ) -> {
    int result = e1.compareTo( e2 );
    return result;
} );
```

lambdalambda

java.lang.Runnable java.util.concurrent.Callable   
  
Java 8 @FunctionalInterface    
java @FunctionalInterface   

```java
@FunctionalInterface
public interface Functional {
    void method();
}
```

  

```java
@FunctionalInterface
public interface FunctionalDefaultMethods {
    void method();
    default void defaultMethod() {
    }
}
```

LambdaJava 8Java[](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/javaOO/lambdaexpressions.html)


:

```java

package com.tu.test.java8.newfeature;

import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.function.Consumer;

public class TestLambda {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// ===================================
		System.out.println("==============1================");
		// Runnable------>
		new Runnable() {
			@Override
			public void run() {
				System.out.println("Runnable");
			}
		}.run();

		// Lambda------>
		System.out.println("==============2================");
		int i = 0;
		Runnable r = () -> {// ().
			System.out.println("LambdaRunnable" + i);
			// ,
		};
		r.run();

		// Lambda------>
		System.out.println("==============3================");
		Runnable r1 = () -> System.out.println("hello lambda!");
		r1.run();

		// ===================================
		// ------>
		System.out.println("==============4================");
		new Action() {
			@Override
			public void execute(String content) {
				System.out.println(content);
			}
		}.execute("jdk1.8");

		// lambda------>
		System.out.println("==============5================");
		Action a = (String content) -> {
			System.out.println(content);
		};
		a.execute("jdk1.8lambda");

		// 
		// ------>
		System.out.println("==============6================");
		Action a1 = System.out::println;
		a1.execute("jdk1.8lambda_.");

		// 
		// lambda------>
		System.out.println("==============7================");
		Action a3 = ((String s) -> System.out.println("*" + s + "*"));
		a3.execute("jdk1.8lambda_.");

		// ===================================

		// ------>
		System.out.println("==============8================");
		System.out.println(new Comparator<Integer>() {
			@Override
			public int compare(Integer o1, Integer o2) {
				return 0;
			}
		}.compare(1, 2));

		// lambda ------>
		System.out.println("==============9================");
		Comparator<Integer> cmp = (x, y) -> {
			return (x < y) ? -1 : ((x > y) ? 1 : 0);
		};

		// lambdareturn------>
		Comparator<Integer> cmp1 = (x, y) -> (x < y) ? -1 : ((x > y) ? 1 : 0);

		System.out.println("TestLambda.main().cmp.compare():" + cmp.compare(0, 1));
		System.out.println("TestLambda.main().cmp1.compare():" + cmp1.compare(1, 1));

		// =====================================

		
		System.out.println("==============10================");
		List<String> list = Arrays.asList("a", "b", "c");
		for (String s : list) {
			new Consumer<String>() {
				@Override
				public void accept(String t) {
					System.out.println(t);
				}
			}.accept(s);
		}

		// Lambda->
		System.out.println("==============11================");
		Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").forEach(e -> System.out.println(e));

		// 
		// 
		System.out.println("==============12================");
		Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").forEach((String e) -> System.out.println(e));

		// Lambdafinal
		// 
		System.out.println("==============13================");
		String separator = ",";
		Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").forEach((String e) -> System.out.print(e + separator));
		
		System.out.println("==============14================");
		final String separator1 = ",";
		Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").forEach((String e) -> System.out.print(e + separator1));

		// LambdaJava
		System.out.println("==============15================");
		String separator2 = ",";
		Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").forEach((String e) -> {
			System.out.print(e + separator2);
			System.out.print(e + separator2);
		});

		// Lambda
		// lambdareturn
		System.out.println("==============16================");
		Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").sort((e1, e2) -> e1.compareTo(e2));
		
		Arrays.asList("a", "b", "d").sort((e1, e2) -> {
			int result = e1.compareTo(e2);
			return result;
		});

	}// main end

	/
	 * 
	 *  @FunctionalInterface Lambda,
	 * javac
	 * 
	 * JavalambdaSAM(Single Abstract Method)
	 * (defender)
	 */
	@FunctionalInterface
	static interface Action {
		void execute(String content);

		default void cancel(String c) {
		}
	}
}//class end

```

## 2.2 

Java 8 Trait    
   

   


```java
private interface Defaulable {
    // Interfaces now allow default methods, the implementer may or
    // may not implement (override) them.
    default String notRequired() {
        return "Default implementation";
    }
}
 
private static class DefaultableImpl implements Defaulable {
}
 
private static class OverridableImpl implements Defaulable {
    @Override
    public String notRequired() {
        return "Overridden implementation";
    }
}
```

 Defaulable  default  notRequired () DefaultableImpl  Defaulable    
OverridableImpl

Java 8 

```java
private interface DefaulableFactory {
    // Interfaces now allow static methods
    static Defaulable create( Supplier< Defaulable > supplier ) {
        return supplier.get();
    }
}
```

::new   

```java
public static void main( String[] args ) {
    Defaulable defaulable = DefaulableFactory.create( DefaultableImpl::new );
    System.out.println( defaulable.notRequired() );
 
    defaulable = DefaulableFactory.create( OverridableImpl::new );
    System.out.println( defaulable.notRequired() );
}
```



	Default implementation
	Overridden implementation

java.util.Collectionstream(), parallelStream(), forEach(), removeIf()

```java
package com.tu.test.java8.newfeature;
import java.util.function.Supplier;

public class TestInterfaceDefaultAndStaticMethod {

	public static void main( String[] args ) {
		
		//::new 
	    Defaulable defaulable = DefaulableFactory.create( DefaultableImpl::new );
	    System.out.println( defaulable.notRequired() );
	 
	    defaulable = DefaulableFactory.create( OverridableImpl::new );
	    System.out.println( defaulable.notRequired() );
	}
	
	private interface Defaulable {
		//,()
	    default String notRequired() {
	        return "Default implementation";
	    }
	}
	 
	private static class DefaultableImpl implements Defaulable {
	}
	 
	private static class OverridableImpl implements Defaulable {
	    @Override
	    public String notRequired() {
	        return "Overridden implementation";
	    }
	}
	
	private interface DefaulableFactory {
		//
	    static Defaulable create( Supplier< Defaulable > supplier ) {
	        return supplier.get();
	    }
	}
}
```

```java
public class TestRepeatingAnnotations {

	@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
	@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
	public @interface Filters {
		Filter[] value();
	}

	@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
	@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
	@Repeatable(Filters.class)
	public @interface Filter {
		String value();
	};

	@Filter("filter1")
	@Filter("filter2")
	public interface Filterable {
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		for (Filter filter : Filterable.class.getAnnotationsByType(Filter.class)) {
			System.out.println(filter.value());
		}
	}
}
```

```java
package com.tu.test.java8.newfeature;

import java.util.Optional;
import java.util.function.Function;
import java.util.function.Supplier;

public class TestOptional {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

		Optional<String> fullName = Optional.ofNullable(null);
		System.out.println("Full Name is set? " + fullName.isPresent());
		System.out.println("Full Name: " + fullName.orElseGet(() -> "[none]"));
		System.out.println(fullName.map(s -> "Hey " + s + "!").orElse("Hey Stranger!"));

		System.out.println("---------------");

		Optional<String> firstName = Optional.of("Tom");
		System.out.println("First Name is set? " + firstName.isPresent());
		System.out.println("First Name: " + firstName.orElseGet(() -> "[none]"));
		System.out.println(firstName.map(s -> "Hey " + s + "!").orElse("Hey Stranger!"));
		System.out.println();

		//=====lambda=============================firstName.orElseGet(() -> "[none]")
		Supplier<? extends String> other = new Supplier<String>() {
			@Override
			public String get() {
				return "[none]";
			}
		};
		firstName.orElseGet(other);
		//=====lambda=============================firstName.map(s -> "Hey " + s + "!").orElse("Hey Stranger!")
		Function<String, String> mapper = new Function<String, String>() {
			@Override
			public String apply(String t) {
				return "Hey " + t + "!";
			}
		};
		firstName.map(mapper).orElse("Hey Stranger!");
	}
}
```

```java
package com.tu.test.java8.newfeature;

import java.io.File;
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Path;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Collection;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;
import java.util.stream.Stream;

public class TestStream {
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		final Collection< Task > tasks = Arrays.asList(
			    new Task( Status.OPEN, 5 ),
			    new Task( Status.OPEN, 13 ),
			    new Task( Status.CLOSED, 8 ) 
			);

		//Taskjava 8 foreachJava8StreamStream
		// Calculate total points of all active tasks using sum()
		final long totalPointsOfOpenTasks = tasks
		    .stream()
		    .filter( task -> task.getStatus() == Status.OPEN )
		    .mapToInt( Task::getPoints )
		    .sum();
		         
		System.out.println( "Total points: " + totalPointsOfOpenTasks );

		System.out.println("=========================================");
		// Calculate total points of all tasks
		final double totalPoints = tasks
		   .stream()
		   .parallel()
		   .map( task -> task.getPoints() ) // or map( Task::getPoints ) 
		   .reduce( 0, Integer::sum );
		    
		System.out.println( "Total points (all tasks): " + totalPoints );
		
		System.out.println("=========================================");
		// Group tasks by their status
		final Map<Status, List<Task>> map = tasks
				.stream()
				.collect(Collectors.groupingBy(Task::getStatus));
		System.out.println(map);
		
		System.out.println("=========================================");
		// Calculate the weight of each tasks (as percent of total points) 
		final Collection< String > result = tasks
		    .stream()                                        // Stream< String >
		    .mapToInt( Task::getPoints )                     // IntStream
		    .asLongStream()                                  // LongStream
		    .mapToDouble( points -> points / totalPoints )   // DoubleStream
		    .boxed()                                         // Stream< Double >
		    .mapToLong( weigth -> ( long )( weigth * 100 ) ) // LongStream
		    .mapToObj( percentage -> percentage + "%" )      // Stream< String> 
		    .collect( Collectors.toList() );                 // List< String > 
		         
		System.out.println( result );

		System.out.println("=========================================");
		Stream<String> lines;
		try {
			final Path path = new File("./text/Test.txt").toPath();
			lines = Files.lines(path, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
			lines.onClose(() -> System.out.println("Done!")).forEach(System.out::println);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	private enum Status {
		OPEN, CLOSED
	};

	private static final class Task {
		private final Status status;
		private final Integer points;

		Task(final Status status, final Integer points) {
			this.status = status;
			this.points = points;
		}

		public Integer getPoints() {
			return points;
		}

		public Status getStatus() {
			return status;
		}

		@Override
		public String toString() {
			return String.format("[%s, %d]", status, points);
		}
	}
}
```

```java
	List<String> stringCollection = Arrays.asList("ddd2", "aaa2", "bbb1", "aaa1", "bbb3", "ccc", "bbb2", "ddd1");

	// Filter 
	stringCollection.stream().filter((s) -> s.startsWith("a")).forEach(System.out::println);
	System.out.println("=========1==========");
	// Sort 
	stringCollection.stream().sorted().filter((s) -> s.startsWith("a")).forEach(System.out::println);
	System.out.println("=========2==========");
	// Map 
	stringCollection.stream().map(String::toUpperCase).sorted((a, b) -> b.compareTo(a))
			.forEach(System.out::println);
	System.out.println("=========3==========");
	// Match 
	System.out.println(stringCollection.stream().anyMatch((s) -> s.startsWith("a")));
	System.out.println(stringCollection.stream().allMatch((s) -> s.startsWith("a")));
	System.out.println(stringCollection.stream().noneMatch((s) -> s.startsWith("a")));
	System.out.println("=========4==========");
	// Count  ()
	System.out.println(stringCollection.stream().count());
	System.out.println(stringCollection.stream().filter((a) -> a.startsWith("a")).count());
	System.out.println("=========5==========");
	// Reduce  ()
	stringCollection.stream().sorted().reduce((s1, s2) -> s1 + "#" + s2).ifPresent(System.out::println);
	System.out.println("========6===========");
	
	// Streams
	int max = 1000000;
	List<String> values = new ArrayList<>(max);
	for (int i = 0; i < max; i++) {
		values.add(UUID.randomUUID().toString());
	}
	
	long t0 = System.nanoTime();
	//  sequential sort took:1226 ms
	long count = values.stream().sorted().count();
	System.out.println(count);
	long t1 = System.nanoTime();
	long millis = TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS.toMillis(t1 - t0);
	System.out.println(String.format("sequential sort took:%d ms", millis));

	long t2 = System.nanoTime();
	//  sequential sort took:951 ms
	long count1 = values.parallelStream().sorted().count();
	System.out.println(count1);
	long t3 = System.nanoTime();
	long millis1 = TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS.toMillis(t3 - t2);
	System.out.println(String.format("parallel sort took:%d ms", millis1));
```

```c
	static inline void fs_config(const char *path, int dir,
				     unsigned *uid, unsigned *gid, unsigned *mode)
	{
	    struct fs_path_config *pc;
	    int plen;
	    
	    pc = dir ? android_dirs : android_files;
	    plen = strlen(path);
	    for(; pc->prefix; pc++){
		int len = strlen(pc->prefix);
		if (dir) {
		    if(plen < len) continue;
		    if(!strncmp(pc->prefix, path, len)) break;
		    continue;
		}
		/* If name ends in * then allow partial matches. */
		if (pc->prefix[len -1] == '*') {
		    if(!strncmp(pc->prefix, path, len - 1)) break;
		} else if (plen == len){
		    if(!strncmp(pc->prefix, path, len)) break;
		}
	    }
	    *uid = pc->uid;
	    *gid = pc->gid;
	    *mode = (*mode & (~07777)) | pc->mode;
	    
	#if 0
	    fprintf(stderr,"< '%s' '%s' %d %d %o >\n", 
		    path, pc->prefix ? pc->prefix : "", *uid, *gid, *mode);
	#endif
	}
	#endif
	#endif
```

```c
	static inline void fs_config(const char *path, int dir,
				     unsigned *uid, unsigned *gid, unsigned *mode)
	{
	    struct fs_path_config *pc;
	    int plen;
	    
	    pc = dir ? android_dirs : android_files;
	    plen = strlen(path);
	    for(; pc->prefix; pc++){
		int len = strlen(pc->prefix);
		if (dir) {
		    if(plen < len) continue;
		    if(!strncmp(pc->prefix, path, len)) break;
		    continue;
		}
		/* If name ends in * then allow partial matches. */
		if (pc->prefix[len -1] == '*') {
		    if(!strncmp(pc->prefix, path, len - 1)) break;
		} else if (plen == len){
		    if(!strncmp(pc->prefix, path, len)) break;
		}
	    }
	    *uid = pc->uid;
	    *gid = pc->gid;
	    *mode = (*mode & (~07777)) | pc->mode;
	    
	#if 0
	    fprintf(stderr,"< '%s' '%s' %d %d %o >\n", 
		    path, pc->prefix ? pc->prefix : "", *uid, *gid, *mode);
	#endif
	}
	#endif
	#endif
```

## Chmodchown
	
### Chmod

		4(R) , 2(W) , 1(X)
		7=4+2+1 
		6=4+2   
		5=4+1   
		4       
		3=3+1   
		2
		1
		664UID,GID,

	2.Shell,R/W/X,-
	3.,Chmod,,
		( a:all , u:owner user , g:group , +:add one premission , -:remove one permission)
			
	
```shell

	-rw-rw-r-- system   system         12 2015-07-02 18:02 test.txt
	shell@android:/data/test # chmod 777 test.txt
	chmod 777 test.txt
	shell@android:/data/test # ls -l
	ls -l
	-rwxrwxrwx system   system         12 2015-07-02 18:02 test.txt
	shell@android:/data/test #
	shell@android:/data/test # chmod 664 test.txt
	chmod 664 test.txt
	shell@android:/data/test # ls -l
	ls -l
	-rw-rw-r-- system   system         12 2015-07-02 18:02 test.txt
	shell@android:/data/test #
```

```shell
	test.txt

	ls -l

	chown system:system test.txt
	shell@android:/data/test # ls -l
```

> com_tu_test_androidndk_jni_Port.h

```c
JNIEXPORT jstring JNICALL Java_com_tu_androidndk_jni_Port_sayHello
  (JNIEnv *, jclass, jstring);
```

> AndroidNDK.app..

```c
#include <jni.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include "com_tu_androidndk_jni_Port.h"//
#include <android/log.h>
//Logcat Android.mk : LOCAL_LDLIBS += -L$(SYSROOT)/usr/lib -llog

JNIEXPORT jstring JNICALL Java_com_tu_androidndk_jni_Port_sayHello(
		JNIEnv *env, jclass clazz, jstring s) {

	char * st = (char *) env->GetStringUTFChars(s, 0);
	printf("\n c-string:  %s", st);

	//Logcat,,,Tag,Text
	__android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "JNIMsg", "\n c-string: %s",st);

	jstring rtn = env->NewStringUTF("hello Comtu!");
	return rtn;
}

```

> javalib

```java
	package com.tu.androidndkhelloworld;
	import android.app.Activity;
	import android.os.Bundle;
	import android.widget.TextView;
	import com.tu.androidndkhelloworld.jni.Port;

	public class MainActivity extends Activity {
		static {
			System.loadLibrary("AndroidNDK");
		}
		@Override
		protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
			super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
			setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
			//CsayHello
			((TextView)findViewById(R.id.text)).setText(Port.sayHello("Hi"));
		}
	}
```

```xml
	LOCAL_PATH := $(call my-dir)
```

```java
	public class TwoPort {
		public static native String getWords();
	}
```

> javah().jni.

		|-Android.mk

```c
	#include <jni.h>
	#include <stdio.h>
	#include "com_tu_test_androidndk_jni_Port.h"//
	#include "com_tu_test_androidndk_jni_TwoPort.h"
	#include <android/log.h>
	#include <Hello.h>
	//Logcat Android.mk : LOCAL_LDLIBS += -L$(SYSROOT)/usr/lib -llog

	JNIEXPORT jstring JNICALL Java_com_tu_androidndk_jni_Port_sayHello(
			JNIEnv *env, jclass clazz, jstring s) {

		char * st = (char *) env->GetStringUTFChars(s, 0);
		printf("\n c-string:  %s", st);

		//Logcat,,,Tag,Text
		__android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "JNIMsg", "\n c-string: %s", st);

		jstring rtn = env->NewStringUTF("hello Comtu!");
		return rtn;
	}

	JNIEXPORT jstring JNICALL Java_com_tu_androidndk_jni_TwoPort_getWords(
			JNIEnv *env, jclass clazz) {
		Hello h;
		return env->NewStringUTF((const char *) h.getWords());
	}
```

```c
	#include "com_tu_test_androidndk_jni_Port.h"//
	#include "com_tu_test_androidndk_jni_TwoPort.h"
	#include <android/log.h>
	#include <Hello.h>
	//Logcat Android.mk : LOCAL_LDLIBS += -L$(SYSROOT)/usr/lib -llog

	JNIEXPORT jstring JNICALL Java_com_tu_androidndk_jni_Port_sayHello(
			JNIEnv *env, jclass clazz, jstring s) {

		char * st = (char *) env->GetStringUTFChars(s, 0);
		printf("\n c-string:  %s", st);

		//Logcat,,,Tag,Text
		__android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "JNIMsg", "\n c-string: %s", st);

		jstring rtn = env->NewStringUTF("hello Comtu!");
		return rtn;
	}

	JNIEXPORT jstring JNICALL Java_com_tu_androidndk_jni_TwoPort_getWords(
			JNIEnv *env, jclass clazz) {
		Hello h;
		return env->NewStringUTF((const char *) h.getWords());
	}
```

```c
	//C
	jclass port_clazz = env->GetObjectClass(obj);

	//public int property;
	jfieldID fieldId_prop = env->GetFieldID(port_clazz, "property", "I");
	jint prop = env->GetIntField(obj, fieldId_prop);//
	__android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "JNIMsg", "\n c-int: %d", prop);
	//java
	env->SetIntField(obj, fieldId_prop, 100L);//100Lc100.
	
	//
	jfieldID fieldId_isShow = env->GetStaticFieldID(port_clazz, "isShow", "Z");
	jboolean jb = env->GetStaticBooleanField(port_clazz, fieldId_isShow);
	__android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "JNIMsg", "\n c-boolean: %d", jb);
	jboolean b = !jb;
	env->SetStaticBooleanField(port_clazz, fieldId_isShow, b);//
```

```java
	//Java
	public class Port {
		/** C_ */
		public void functionOverride() {
			System.out.println("Port.functionOverride()--:property>" + property + "--isShow>" + isShow);
		}

		/** C_ */
		public void functionOverride(int i) {
			System.out.println("Port.functionOverride(int i)-->" + i + "--:property>" + property + "--isShow>" + isShow);
		}

		/** C_ */
		public int function(int foo, Date date, int[] arr) {
			System.out.println("Port.function()foo>" + foo + "===date>" + date + "==arr>" + arr);
			return foo;
		}

		/** C  */
		public boolean function(int i, double d, char c) {
			System.out.println("===>Port.function()i>" + i + "===d>" + d + "==c>" + c);
			return true;
		}
	}
```

```c
	//
	char* cc2c(const char* str) {
		char* strtemp = new char[strlen(str) + 1];
		strcpy(strtemp, str);
		return strtemp;
	}

	//
	char* myReverse(const char* str) {
		char* strtemp = cc2c(str);
		int len = strlen(strtemp);
		char t;
		for (int i = 0; i < len / 2; i++) {
			t = strtemp[i];
			strtemp[i] = strtemp[len - i - 1];
			strtemp[len - i - 1] = t;
		}
		return strtemp;
	}
	void function(JNIEnv * env, jobject obj) {
		//------------------ GetStringUTFChars / ReleaseStringUTFChars / NewStringUTF -------
		jfieldID jfie_msg = env->GetFieldID(env->GetObjectClass(obj), "message", "Ljava/lang/String;");
		jstring j_msg = (jstring) env->GetObjectField(obj, jfie_msg);
		//	Java-String->C-jchar*
		const char* str = env->GetStringUTFChars(j_msg, NULL);
		char* strtemp = myReverse(str);
		env->ReleaseStringUTFChars(j_msg, str);
		jstring j_new_str = env->NewStringUTF(strtemp);
		delete[] strtemp;
		env->SetObjectField(obj, jfie_msg, j_new_str);
	}
```

```c	
	//---------------- GetStringUTFRegion / NewStringUTF ----------------
	void function(JNIEnv * env, jobject obj) {
		jfieldID jfie_msg = env->GetFieldID(env->GetObjectClass(obj), "message", "Ljava/lang/String;");
		jstring j_msg = (jstring) env->GetObjectField(obj, jfie_msg);

		//std::reverse(wstr.begin(), wstr.end());
		jstring j_new_str = env->NewStringUTF((const char*) buffer);

		env->SetObjectField(obj, jfie_msg, j_new_str);
		delete[] buffer;
	}
```

```c
		for (i = 0; i < lenStr; i++) {
			jobject obj = env->GetObjectArrayElement(str_arr, i);
			jstring str = (jstring) obj;

			const char * szStr = env->GetStringUTFChars(str, 0);
			printf(" %d-%s ", i, szStr);
			__android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "JNIMsg", "\n c-StringArray[]: %d - %s", i, szStr);
			const jchar * chars = (const jchar *) szStr;
			env->ReleaseStringChars(str, chars);
		}
		// , Java.
		jstring str;
		jobjectArray args = 0;
		jsize size = 7;
		char* sa[] = { "Hello,", "world!", "c", "o", "m", "t", "u" };
		int j = 0;
		jclass objClass = env->FindClass("java/lang/String");
		args = env->NewObjectArray(size, objClass, 0);
		for (j = 0; j < size; j++) {
			str = env->NewStringUTF(sa[j]);
			env->SetObjectArrayElement(args, j, str);
			if (j < lenStr)//Java ,
				env->SetObjectArrayElement(str_arr, j, str);//Javastrs
		}
```

    package com.tu.test.visibility;

    public class SynchronizedDemo {
        // 
        private boolean ready = false;
        private int result = 0;
        private int number = 1;

        // 
        public void write() {
            ready = true; // 1.1
            try {//
                Thread.sleep(100);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            }
            number = 2; // 1.2
        }

        // 
        public void read() {
            if (ready) {// 2.1
                result = number * 3;// 2.2
            }
            System.out.println("result" + result );
        }

        // 
        private class ReadWriteThread extends Thread {
            // flag,
            private boolean flag;

            public ReadWriteThread(boolean flag) {
                this.flag = flag;
            }

            @Override
            public void run() {
                if (flag) {
                    write();
                } else
                    read();
            }
        }

        public static void main(String[] args) {
            for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
                SynchronizedDemo synDemo = new SynchronizedDemo();
                synDemo.new ReadWriteThread(true).start();
                synDemo.new ReadWriteThread(false).start();
                // 
                //: 1.1->2.1->2.2->1.2 :result = 3  <- :="" 1.1-="">2.1->1.2->2.2 :result = 6  <- :="" 1.1-="">1.2->2.1->2.2 :result = 6
                //: 2.1->1.1->1.2 :result = 0
            }
        }
    }

    package com.tu.test.visibility;

    public class VolatileDemo {
        private volatile int number = 0;

        public int getNumber() {
            return this.number;
        }

        public void increase() {
            try {
                Thread.sleep(100);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                // TODO Auto-generated catch block
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            this.number++;
        }

        public static void main(String[] args) {
            final VolatileDemo volMemo = new VolatileDemo();
            for (int i = 0; i < 500; i++) {
                new Thread() {
                    public void run() {
                        volMemo.increase();
                    };
                }.start();
            }

            // ,CPU
            // ,
            while (Thread.activeCount() > 1) {
                Thread.yield();
            }

            //number500.number++
            //,500
            System.out.println("number" + volMemo.getNumber());
        }
    }

public void increase() {

    synchronized (this) {

    }

// ReentrantLock 
private Lock lock = new ReentrantLock();
public void increase() {
    try {
        Thread.sleep(100);
    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
    lock.lock();//
    try {
        this.number++;
    } finally {
        lock.unlock();// .try.JDKtry..finally
    }
}

			}

		}

		signingConfigs{ //
			releasekey{ //
				storeFile file('MyKey.keystore') //
				storePassword 'android' // key
				keyAlias 'androiddebugkey' //
				keyPassword 'android' //
			}

			debugkey{
				storeFile file('debug.keystore')
				storePassword 'android'
				keyAlias 'androiddebugkey'
				keyPassword 'android'
			}
		}

		defaultConfig { //apk ,AndroidManifest.xml
			applicationId "com.tu.myapplication" // AndroidManifest.xml
			minSdkVersion 8
			targetSdkVersion 22
			versionCode 1
			versionName "1.0"

			signingConfig signingConfigs.releasekey //  
		}

		productFlavors { //
			//buildTypes,build/outputs/apk/
			// (productFlavors*buildTypes*2)apk

				applicationId 'com.tu.myapplication' //

			}
			pad {
				applicationId 'com.tu.myapplication.hd'
				signingConfig signingConfigs.debugkey
			}

		buildTypes { //, .

			//        formonkeytest{
			//            applicationIdSuffix '.monkey'
			//        }
		}
	}

	dependencies {	//
		//jar --> Open Module Settings  -- > Project Structure -->

		//compile files('libs/gson-2.2.4.jar') //jar

		//
		//libsjar , .
		compile fileTree(include: ['*.jar'], dir: 'libs') 

		//Libaray v7 Open Module Settings  -- > Project Structure --> 
		//app --> Dependencies --> + Library Dependencies
		compile 'com.android.support:appcompat-v7:22.1.1' //.

		//  Open Module Settings  -- > Project Structure --> app -->

build.gradle

: 

    
    //Application apk
    // 'com.android.library' apk,
    // jar  aar (aar,Eclipse)
    apply plugin: 'com.android.application'  

    android { //
        compileSdkVersion 22 //Build
        buildToolsVersion "22.0.1" 
        //,,ASBuild,,

        sourceSets{ //.productFlavors
            phone{
                manifest.srcFile 'src/phone/AndroidManifest.xml'
                assets.srcDirs = ['src/phone/assets']
                //java.srcDirs = ['src']
                //resources.srcDirs = ['src']
                //aidl.srcDirs = ['src']
                //renderscript.srcDirs = ['src']
                //res.srcDirs = ['src']
            }

            pad{
                manifest.srcFile 'src/pad/AndroidManifest.xml'
                assets.srcDirs = ['src/pad/assets']
            }

        }

        signingConfigs{ //
            releasekey{ //
                storeFile file('MyKey.keystore') //
                storePassword 'android' // key
                keyAlias 'androiddebugkey' //
                keyPassword 'android' //
            }

            debugkey{
                storeFile file('debug.keystore')
                storePassword 'android'
                keyAlias 'androiddebugkey'
                keyPassword 'android'
            }
        }

        defaultConfig { //apk ,AndroidManifest.xml
            applicationId "com.tu.myapplication" // AndroidManifest.xml
            minSdkVersion 8
            targetSdkVersion 22
            versionCode 1
            versionName "1.0"

            signingConfig signingConfigs.releasekey //  
        }

        productFlavors { //
            //buildTypes,build/outputs/apk/
            // (productFlavors*buildTypes*2)apk
            phone {
                applicationId 'com.tu.myapplication' //
                signingConfig signingConfigs.debugkey //
            }
            pad {
                applicationId 'com.tu.myapplication.hd'
                signingConfig signingConfigs.debugkey
            }
        }

        buildTypes { //, .
            //,release debug 4apk  , 
            // productFlavors 2,buildTypes22*2*2=8apk

            release { //
                minifyEnabled false
                proguardFiles getDefaultProguardFile('proguard-android.txt'), 'proguard-rules.pro'
            }

            //        // app-fordebug.apk , app-fordebug-unaligned.apk
            //        fordebug {
            //            applicationIdSuffix '.debug'
            //        //.debug: com.tu.myapplication.debug
            //        }
            //
            //        // app-fordailybuild.apk , app-fordailybuild-unaligned.apk
            //        fordailybuild{
            //            applicationIdSuffix '.db'//.db
            //        }
            //
            //        // app-formonkeytest.apk , app-formonkeytest-unaligned.apk
            //        formonkeytest{
            //            applicationIdSuffix '.monkey'
            //        }
        }
    }

    dependencies {    //
        //jar --> Open Module Settings  -- > Project Structure -->
        //app --> Dependencies --> + File Dependencies -->jar
        //compile files('libs/gson-2.2.4.jar') //jar

        //
        //libsjar , .
        compile fileTree(include: ['*.jar'], dir: 'libs') 

        //Libaray v7 Open Module Settings  -- > Project Structure --> 
        //app --> Dependencies --> + Library Dependencies
        compile 'com.android.support:appcompat-v7:22.1.1' //.

        //  Open Module Settings  -- > Project Structure --> app --> 
        //Dependencies --> + module Dependencies
        compile project(':library:mylibrary') //()

        // Open Module Settings  -- > Project Structure --> app --> 
        //Dependencies --> + Library Dependencies 
        // httpmime . Gradlejar. 
        compile 'org.apache.httpcomponents:httpmime:4.5' 

        //,: hx.gy :1080
        //File--> settings --> Appearance & Behavior --> 
        //System Settings --> HTTP Proxy --> manual proxy configuration 
        //--> HTTP --> Host name: hx.gy --> Port number: 1080 -->ok
    }

    class Paging_demo extends CI_Controller {
        public function index() {
        }
        //http://127.0.0.1:8000/CodeIgniter-3.0.0/paging_demo/paging
        public function paging() {
            // 
            $this->load->library ( 'pagination' );
            // 10
            $page_size = 10;

            $this->load->helper('url');
            //
            $config ['base_url'] = site_url('paging_demo/paging');
            //
            $config ['total_rows'] = '200';
            //
            $config ['per_page'] = $page_size;

            //
            $config['uri_seqment'] = 3;

            $config['first_link'] = '';
            $config['next_link'] = '';
            $config['last_link'] = '';

            $this->pagination->initialize ( $config );

            //http://127.0.0.1:8000/CodeIgniter-3.0.0/paging_demo/paging/190
            //190 $config['uri_seqment']
            $offset = intval($this->uri->segment(3));//intval,0

            //Sql
            $sql = "select * from blog_user limit $offset , $page_size";
            echo $sql.'<br>';

            //
            $data['links']=$this->pagination->create_links ();
            //
            $this->load->view('user/paging_view',$data);
        }
    }

class Upload_demo extends CI_Controller {
    public function index() {
    }

    // http://127.0.0.1:8000/CodeIgniter-3.0.0/upload_demo/file
    public function file() {
        $data ['error'] = '';
        $data ['upload_data'] = '';

        $this->load->helper ( 'url' );
        $this->load->view ( 'user/upload_view_demo', $data );
    }
    public function upload() {
        // 
        $config ['upload_path'] = './uploads/';
        $config ['allowed_types'] = 'gif|jpg|png';
        $config ['max_size'] = 100;//kb
        $config ['max_width'] = 1024;
        $config ['max_height'] = 768;
        // /,,
        //$config ['file_name'] = uniqid ();

        $this->upload->do_upload ( 'pic' );//input name
        $this->upload->do_upload ( 'pic2' );//input name

        $data = array (
                'upload_data' => $this->upload->data () ,//
                'error' => $this->upload->display_errors ()//
        );
        $this->load->view ( 'user/upload_view_demo', $data );
    }
}

            foreach (gd_info() as $cate=>$value)

                        'border' => array(255, 255, 255),
                        'text' => array(0, 0, 0),

        );

        echo $word;
    }
}

<?php
    class Paging_demo extends CI_Controller {
        public function index() {
        }
        //http://127.0.0.1:8000/CodeIgniter-3.0.0/paging_demo/paging
        public function paging() {
            // 
            $this->load->library ( 'pagination' );
            // 10
            $page_size = 10;

            $this->load->helper('url');
            //
            $config ['base_url'] = site_url('paging_demo/paging');
            //
            $config ['total_rows'] = '200';
            //
            $config ['per_page'] = $page_size;

            //
            $config['uri_seqment'] = 3;

            $config['first_link'] = '';
            $config['next_link'] = '';
            $config['last_link'] = '';

            $this->pagination->initialize ( $config );

            //http://127.0.0.1:8000/CodeIgniter-3.0.0/paging_demo/paging/190
            //190 $config['uri_seqment']
            $offset = intval($this->uri->segment(3));//intval,0

            //Sql
            $sql = "select * from blog_user limit $offset , $page_size";

class Upload_demo extends CI_Controller {
    public function index() {
    }

    // http://127.0.0.1:8000/CodeIgniter-3.0.0/upload_demo/file
    public function file() {
        $data ['error'] = '';
        $data ['upload_data'] = '';

        $this->load->helper ( 'url' );
        $this->load->view ( 'user/upload_view_demo', $data );
    }
    public function upload() {
        // 
        $config ['upload_path'] = './uploads/';
        $config ['allowed_types'] = 'gif|jpg|png';
        $config ['max_size'] = 100;//kb
        $config ['max_width'] = 1024;
        $config ['max_height'] = 768;
        // /,,
        //$config ['file_name'] = uniqid (); 

        $this->load->library ( 'upload', $config );

        $this->upload->do_upload ( 'pic' );//input name
        $this->upload->do_upload ( 'pic2' );//input name

        $data = array (
                'upload_data' => $this->upload->data () ,//
                'error' => $this->upload->display_errors ()//
        );
        $this->load->view ( 'user/upload_view_demo', $data );
    }
}

class Captcha_demo extends CI_Controller{

    public function test(){
        echo 'captcha_demo';

        if(extension_loaded('gd')){
            echo 'gd<br>';
            foreach (gd_info() as $cate=>$value)
                echo "$cate: $value<br>";
        }else echo 'gd';

        $this->load->helper('url');

                'word'      => $number,//,.
                'img_path'  => dirname(BASEPATH).'/captcha/',//,

                // White background and border, black text and red grid
                'colors'    => array(
                        'background' => array(255, 255, 255),
                        'border' => array(255, 255, 255),
                        'text' => array(0, 0, 0),
                        'grid' => array(255, 40, 40)
                )
        );

        //Session
        $word = $_SESSION['cap'];
        echo $word;
    }
}

                    $data['department'] = Department::all();//
                    return view('demo.demo_add_update_database',$data);
                    }

                    public function postAddPerson(){
                    $person = new Person();
                    //2
                    $person->name = Request::input('name', 'default');//Post
                    $person->age = Request::input('age', 20);
                    $person->sex = Request::input('sex', 0);
                    $person->salary = Request::input('salary', 1800);
                    $person->occ_id = Request::input('occ_id');
                    $person->dep_id = Request::input('dep_id');
                    $person->save();
                    //$person->pid; id.
                    return redirect('myDatabase/Demo');
                    }

                    public function deletePerson($rid,$_token = ''){
                    if(Session::token() !== $_token) {
                        echo '';
                        return;
                    }

                    $person = Person::find($rid);
                    $person->delete();
                    return redirect('myDatabase/Demo');
                    }

                    //http://localhost/myDatabase/DemoUpdatePerson?pid=6&_token=7jcZiP2wv0nIpxrA4KUqn9sBRaU7YXpcc8M0zrue
                    public function updatePerson(){
                    $_token = Input::get('_token');//get
                    if(Session::token()!=$_token){
                        echo '';
                        return ;
                    }
                    $pid = Input::get('pid');

                    $data['person'] = Person::find($pid);
                    $data['occupation'] = Occupation::all();//
                    $data['department'] = Department::get();//
                    return view('demo.demo_add_update_database',$data);
                    }

                    public function postUpdatePerson(){
                    $person = Person::find(Request::input('pid'));
                    if(!$person){
                        echo '';
                        return;
                    }

                    //
                    $person->name = Request::input('name');
                    $person->age = Request::input('age');
                    $person->sex = Request::input('sex');
                    $person->salary = Request::input('salary');
                    $person->occ_id = Request::input('occ_id');
                    $person->dep_id = Request::input('dep_id');
                    $person->save();
                    return redirect('myDatabase/Demo');
                    }
                }

       'occ_id' => 'required|numeric|exists:occupation,occ_id',
        'dep_id' => 'required|numeric|exists:department,dep_id',
    ];
    $messages = [//
        'required' => 'The :attribute field is required.',
        'between' => 'The :attribute must be between :min - :max.'

            <?php
            namespace App\Http\Middleware;
            use Closure;
            use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Session;
            class AdminPrivilegeMiddleware
            {
                /**
                 * Handle an incoming request.
                 * @param  \Illuminate\Http\Request  $request
                 * @param  \Closure  $next
                 * @return mixed
                 */
                public function handle($request, Closure $next)
                {
                //
                $bool = Session::has('admin_user');
                if(!$bool)
                    return redirect('admin/privilege/login');
                return $next($request);
                }
            }

                <?php namespace App\Http\Controllers;
                use App\Http\Requests;
                use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;

                use App\Model\Occupation;
                use App\Model\Department;
                use App\Model\Person;
                use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Input;
                use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Request;
                use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Session;


                class DemoDataBaseController extends Controller{

                    public function index() {
                    //$data['person'] = Person::find(array('1'));// select * from person where id = 1;
                    //$data['person'] = Person::whereRaw('pid > 1 and salary > 1700')->get();//

                    //~~Person
                    $data['person'] = Person::with('occupation', 'department')->paginate(10);// paginate,10.
                    //$data['person'] = Person::with('occupation','department')->get();// //get,all
                    //<?php foreach ($person as $v):?>//
                    //<?php echo $v['occupation']->name;?> 
                    //<?php endforeach;?>
                    $data['count']  =  Person::all()->count();
                    $data['occupation'] = Occupation::get();//
                    $data['department'] = Department::all();//

                    return view('demo.demo_index_database',$data);
                    }

                    public function addPerson(){
                    $data['occupation'] = Occupation::get();//
                    $data['department'] = Department::all();//
                    return view('demo.demo_add_update_database',$data);
                    }

                    public function postAddPerson(){
                    $person = new Person();
                    //2
                    $person->name = Request::input('name', 'default');//Post
                    $person->age = Request::input('age', 20);
                    $person->sex = Request::input('sex', 0);
                    $person->salary = Request::input('salary', 1800);
                    $person->occ_id = Request::input('occ_id');
                    $person->dep_id = Request::input('dep_id');
                    $person->save();
                    //$person->pid; id.
                    return redirect('myDatabase/Demo');
                    }

                    public function deletePerson($rid,$_token = ''){
                    if(Session::token() !== $_token) {
                        echo '';
                        return;
                    }

                    $person = Person::find($rid);
                    $person->delete();
                    return redirect('myDatabase/Demo');
                    }

                    //http://localhost/myDatabase/DemoUpdatePerson?pid=6&_token=7jcZiP2wv0nIpxrA4KUqn9sBRaU7YXpcc8M0zrue
                    public function updatePerson(){
                    $_token = Input::get('_token');//get
                    if(Session::token()!=$_token){
                        echo '';
                        return ;
                    }
                    $pid = Input::get('pid');

                    $data['person'] = Person::find($pid);
                    $data['occupation'] = Occupation::all();//
                    $data['department'] = Department::get();//
                    return view('demo.demo_add_update_database',$data);
                    }

                    public function postUpdatePerson(){
                    $person = Person::find(Request::input('pid'));
                    if(!$person){
                        echo '';
                        return;
                    }

                    //
                    $person->name = Request::input('name');
                    $person->age = Request::input('age');
                    $person->sex = Request::input('sex');

        'salary' => 'required|numeric',
       'occ_id' => 'required|numeric|exists:occupation,occ_id',
        'dep_id' => 'required|numeric|exists:department,dep_id',
    ];
    $messages = [//
        'required' => 'The :attribute field is required.',
        'between' => 'The :attribute must be between :min - :max.'
    ];
    $validator = Validator::make($rq,$rules,$messages);//
    //$validator = Validator::make($rq,$rules);//

    if($validator->fails()){//
        $person = new Person();//
        $person->name = Request::old()['name'];//,
        $person->age = Request::old()['age'];

    return redirect('myDatabase/Demo');
    }

            <?php
            namespace App\Http\Middleware;
            use Closure;
            use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Session;
            class AdminPrivilegeMiddleware
            {
                /**
                 * Handle an incoming request.
                 * @param  \Illuminate\Http\Request  $request
                 * @param  \Closure  $next
                 * @return mixed
                 */
                public function handle($request, Closure $next)
                {
                //
                $bool = Session::has('admin_user');
                if(!$bool)
                    return redirect('admin/privilege/login');
                return $next($request);
                }
            }
